scripts.build: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm --filter web build && pnpm --filter server build
scripts.build:web: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm --filter web build
scripts.build:server: pnpm run build:packages && pnpm --filter server build
scripts.check:type: pnpm -F web typecheck && pnpm -F server build && pnpm -F @shared/lib build
scripts.check:test: pnpm -F web test && pnpm -F server test && pnpm -F @shared/lib test
scripts.check:smoke: pnpm run smoke:web && pnpm run smoke:server
scripts.check:done: pnpm run check:type && pnpm run check:test && pnpm run check:lint && pnpm run check:smoke
